title: Riot games survey
body:
Took a survey from riot a minute ago but i few of the options were missing, wasnt sure if i just misunderstood the question or if they were actually missing
http://imgur.com/mdK9gcR

replies.body: Took a survey earlier too with a different question about omega squad twitch, is this survey legit?
Lol, oops.  I'll pass this on to interested parties so they can check it out.  Thanks for the heads up!
